nodes.title: Clarified the messaging for selected date exceptions.
Revert to 3.8.1 version of Android Maven plugin
Add methods to fix/unfix the view's dimens for use in dialogs
Allow calendar to be non-interactive/"display only"
Fixed bug where selected date didn't update if an OnDateSelectedListener...
Added a method to get notified for data unselected events
month_name_format LLLL breaks build and API compatibility
Produce aar in addition to apklib
Calendar events with cell background color
Fix issues caused by mixed locales
Fix #53: issues with Monday as first day of week
CPV in dialog: added to sample, perf improvements
Make "today" and selected days actually visible.
Change over to a fluent initialization method
Add period cell states for styling purposes
Allow fine-grained style overriding by client applications
Fix IllegalStateException when trying to add a header or footer to the CalendarPickerView on Samsung Galaxy Nexus running Android 4.2.2
Allow overriding invalid date selection behavior
Cleanup some API, add some tests/validation
Add listener to set selectability of arbitrary dates
Call init in graphical layout editor
Set selected shouldn't choose unselectable cell
add a method to select a date & corresponding tests
Bump to sdk17, new robolectric, fix checkstyle
Taking account the first day of week
The Activity which holds the Calendar will be notified whenever a new date is picked by the user
Fix issue #8 (first of the month wasn't being exclusive)
Created new color resources that make today cell color customization very easy
i have updated some stuffs on your main activity
Issue #467: Added method for updating a range of dates
Highlights holidays and list them in month view
Missing digits on all displayAlwaysDigitNumbers feature
Adding feature to always show digit dates on any locale
Ability to hide the week view via xml attribute
Bump to new Gradle so we can open in latest AS, format sample layout xml files
Add option to display months in reverse order
Move RangeState up to top level and make public.
Fixing an issue where the dates in a range cannot be cleared.
Update gradle.  Update android target&compile version to 25
New build tools and gradle version
change some method from private to protected
Prevent ui blocking when highlighting some 'high' amount of dates
Implemented methods to set the month name format programatically
Implemented an initialization to enforce the first day of the week re…
Feature request #309 limit range selection to specified amount of days.
Enhancement issue #242 added isHighlighted() and getRangeState() methods.
New Feature: Added the ability to use custom colors as requested in issue #282
Perf improvement in CalendarCellView (finish work by @yanngx)
Add support for Arabic numbers (finishing work by @JulianRayner)
Exposing a text color property for highlighted state
Add German and Dutch translation. replaces #233
Force Travis to use an older Maven version
Fix bug where updated decorators wouldn't apply, cleaned up sample
Remove 0 checks on dates, as 0 is a valid date
Option to select a single date as range
Init calendar with Collection of dates instead of date range (optional). Plus `scrollToDate(Date date)` and `unHighlightAllDates()` independent methods.
When calculating cell width, make sure to cover all of totalWidth.
Auto-deploy snapshots from Travis CI to Sonatype.
Fix #104: don't allow withSelectedDates to accept >2 dates in RANGE mode
Added a fix to get the correct default title and header text colors
Allow separate typefaces for month title and dates
Adding a method to pass in different ShortWeekdays into CalendarPickerView
Fixed highlighted cells not being cleared.
